item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-10
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Sweet Tomatoes (47 Langley Road, Newton). #
  • "What's the matter, Colonel Sanders? Poultry?" #1stdraftmovielines #
  • Have had Resistance 2 for a couple weeks now waiting to be played. Put it into the PS3 got "this software needs to be updated". Aw crap. #
  • Sonoma woke us up at 4:30 then at 6:00 in the AM. And now I blearily stare at a computer monitor. Me thinks I need a caffeinated product. #
  • Finally getting lunch! Am working too hard today. It always happens the Friday before a new software release. #
  • OH @ lunch: "You don't have any plastic bags?....Well do you have anything that's LIKE a plastic bag?" #
  • "Retirement happens when you have the least amount of time to enjoy it. Spend everyday trying to figure out how to retire NOW" #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
